trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Vero Beach
There were no other sightings in Vero Beach on or around September 21st 2006
Summary: Very dark grey against sky, v. muted lights 6? along two sides. Totally silent.
divs: Sighting Detailsi had just come outside to sit and look at the stars facing east, south east- no moon - very dark sky. I look up almost directly above me, a bit south and I thought I saw something moving - I am always looking for the fast moving lights we see quite often down here .... I had to really focus and then I saw it - very dark in color - almost same as sky - triangular, about 6 what seemed to be extrememly muted lights - which sort of blended with the stars brightness wise - lights along front two sides. Back was dark. Corners were rounded. It was moving slowly - maybe 25 mph - heading due south - totally, totally silent. It took me about 5 full seconds to realize what I was seeing - it was moving and I could not get inside the house fast enough to get my husband out as it would be gone. When it went out of view behind some trees down the horizon, I ran to get my hussband who was out walking the dog. I shouted down the street "did you see it? did you see it?" But he did not. I kept looking in the direction it was heading but it was gone. I only have myself as a witness but I know what I saw. I cannot say the size as I really did not have perspective against the sky. It could have been really low and mid sized or higher up and huge.
